Generated Narrative: SearchParameter AllergyIntolerance-patient

AllergyIntolerancePatientSearchParameter

Parameter patient:reference

Searches for AllergyIntolerance by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient={patientUuid}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: AllergyIntolerancePatientSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient={patientUuid}
